page.title: 03SPRING BANK HOLIDAY 1985
page.content: I{woke}up at 9 o'clock, got dressed, washed and cleaned my teeth. For { {breakfast}I had cornflakes with milk and sugar and a cup of tea. I watched {television}for an hour. I put my shoes on and{waited}for Nicola and Paula. My mum and dad were{ready}now. Then the{ {taxi}came. We all got in to go to {Rotherham}Station. We waited on the platform for the{train to Scarborough. We got to our house at{6 o'clock}had tea and it was time for bed. The{next {day}we went to the{East Coast}on a bus. After{tea}in a cafe we went back to the house. I watched Alligator on{ {television.}After supper I went to bed. The{seagulls}woke me up because they were on the{roof.}But I got to{ {sleep}again. Gavin Moxon 7 years..
